00017 #include <QtGlobal>

00019 ///This const is used to indicate that a file is usable by this program.  The
00020 ///first 4 bytes of a file must match this number to be loaded into the GNAT
00021 ///program.
00022 extern const quint32 SAVEFILE_MAGICNUM;
00023 
00024 ///This const is used to indicate the program version number for use throughout
00025 ///the GNAT program.
00026 extern const float   PROGRAM_VERSIONNUM;
00027 
00028 ///This const is used to indicate the minimum allowed value for edges and nodes.
00029 extern const float   MIN_FLOAT_VAL;
00030 
00031 ///This const is used to indicate the maximum allowed value for edges and nodes.
00032 extern const float   MAX_FLOAT_VAL;

00034 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00035 /// PROGRAM_MODE
00036 ///
00037 /// @description  This enumeration is used to determine which mode the program
00038 ///               is currently in.  It is also used when saving and loading
00039 ///               files to determine what type of file it is.
00040 ///
00041 /// @limitations  None
00042 ///
00043 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00044 enum PROGRAM_MODE
00045 {
00046     MODE_UNDEFINED = 0, ///< This is the default mode.
00047     MODE_PUZZLE    = 1, ///< This is used to indicate the puzzle mode.
00048     MODE_TREE      = 2, ///< This is used to indicate the tree mode.
00049     MODE_CHANCE    = 3  ///< This is used to indicate the chance tree mode.
00050 };
00051 
00052 #endif /*_GNAT_H_*/
